content: We have a scenario where as the result on a clinical encounter a ReferralRequest is made. As a consequence of that Referral an appointment is created. Is there a standard way to relate the appointment to the referralRequest ?
There should be in STU3 as part of the workflow project, but there might not be yet.

IMO, you may create a "planned" encounter plus an appointment. The encounter uses Encounter.incomingReferral to link to the ReferralRequest. And it uses Encounter.appointment to link to the appointment. You should not create a standalone appointment w/o a "planned" encounter to associate with.
Planned encounters aren't a required part of FHIR. It's perfectly legitimate to have just an appointment.
